title: In_Flames-The_Mirrors_Truth-Retail_EP-2008-P2P
description:
The Mirror&#039;s Truth is the first single released by In Flames from their 2008 release A Sense of Purpose. The disc contains the single and three songs, out of which two are previously unreleased, that are not set to appear on A Sense of Purpose. The CD is an exclusive release to Europe. The cover artwork for this single was done by Alex Pardee who also created all cover art for The Used and Aiden&#039;s Conviction.

Enjoy.
